Title: RadioController
Description: This project started from people installing Tablets in Mustangs. You would typically loose most control of the radio. This projects brings that back!
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is the page for the all code related to the RadioController by ZeroAviation

This project uses Xarmin MonoDroid. You can download a free version of their software for development/debugging.

The API commands to the hardware can be found here
MustangRadioControllerAPI.xlsx

This software uses proprietary hardware only available from ZeroAviation.

You are free to rebuild, fork, do whatever you want with the Software. Or build your own UI with the API.

Interested in the Hardware? Contact me
